sections.text: Chicago Booth’s MBA develops analytical, data-driven leaders with the flexibility to design a curriculum tailored to their professional goals.
Students build a foundation in analytics and leadership while choosing from a wide range of electives and experiential programs.

items: Online application with essays, transcripts, and test scores
sections.text: Applicants complete Chicago Booth’s admissions process including essays, test scores, and interview.
Graduates lead in finance, consulting, entrepreneurship, and technology with a focus on analytical decision-making.
